        public static java.lang.String filteredDateTime(java.lang.String originalDateTime)
        Filters string to datetime their by verifying that the string does contain a datetime format.
        Parameters:
        originalDateTime -
        Returns:
        filtered datetime to prevent SQL injections, cross-site scripting and other exploits

      • filteredDateTime

        public static java.lang.String filteredDateTime(java.lang.String originalDateTime,
                                java.sql.Timestamp minimumDateTime,
                                java.sql.Timestamp maximumDateTime)
        Filters datetime to the point where they are safe to use within our application, also verifies whether the datetime is between the specified values.
        Parameters:
        originalDateTime - DateTime string inputted by user
        minimumDateTime - minimum time and date for the string to be returned
        maximumDateTime - maximum time and date for the string to be returned
        Returns:
        filtered datetime to prevent SQL injections, cross-site scripting and other exploits

        Returns:

      • filteredString

        public static java.lang.String filteredString(java.lang.String originalString,
                              char[] characters,
                              boolean whitelist)
        Filters strings based on a array of characters which either are allowed or disallowed
        Parameters:
        originalString - the string to be filtered
        characters - array of characters which depending on the whitelist boolean are allowed or disallowed
        whitelist - if true array of characters is applied as whitelist, default is blacklist
        Returns:
        filtered string to prevent SQL injections, cross-site scripting and other exploits

      • filteredString

        public static java.lang.String filteredString(java.lang.String originalString,
                              int minLength,
                              int maxLength)
        Filters strings with a minimum and maximum length
        Parameters:
        originalString - string to be filtered based on length
        minLength - the minimal length of the string inclusive
        maxLength - the maximum length of the string inclusive
        Returns:
        filtered string to prevent SQL injections, cross-site scripting and other exploits

        Parameters:
        originalString -
        Returns:
        filtered string to prevent SQL injections, cross-site scripting and other exploits
